title: (Tues Early Bird) Bobby Has a Dilemma in Voting for Radio Hall of Fame + Ask Dr. Bobby! + The Generation That Tips the Most
itunes:title: (Tues Early Bird) Bobby Has a Dilemma in Voting for Radio Hall of Fame + Ask Dr. Bobby! + The Generation That Tips the Most
description:
Bobby has a big dilemma when it comes to voting in the Radio National Hall of Fame. There’s a guy up for it who said something awful about Bobby back in the day. We debate whether he should vote for this person or not. We all ask our medical questions to Dr. Bobby! Bobby shares a story about what generation makes up the best tippers and answers a listener question about tipping when you don’t have cash.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
